h2: What drives us today, and what inspires us for tomorrow
We don’t just build businesses. We build confidence and long-lasting success.
Meet the strategists, builders, and storytellers behind the magic
Agevia wouldn’t be "Agevia" without this crew
Recognition we’ve earned for making business simpler, smarter, and more successful
Careers that let you grow while helping businesses grow
We provide global Data Engineering Services to enable AI Solutions.
h3: We provide global Data Engineering Services to enable AI Solutions.
p: Home
AI Initiatives
Our Company
What We Offer
Philanthropy & Impact
Careers
Contact Us
Internal News
While we are motivated by business and economic objectives, we remain committed to our core business beliefs that shape our corporate and individual behaviour around the world.
Our Values
At Lifewood we empower our company and our clients to realise the transformative power of Al: Bringing big data to life, launching new ways of thinking, innovating, learning, and doing.
D
Diversity
We celebrate differences in belief, philosophy and ways of life, because they bring unique perspectives and ideas that encourage everyone to move forward.
C
CARING
We care for every person deeply and equally, because without care work becomes meaningless.
I
INNOVATION
Innovation is at the heart of all we do, enriching our lives and challenging us to continually improve ourselves and our service.
INTEGRITY
We  are dedicated to act ethically and sustainably in everything we do. More than just the bare minimum. It is the basis of our existence as a company.
Mission & Vision
Mission
Vision

To devitop und deploy cutting edge Al technologies that soive real-world problems, empower communities, and advance sustainable practices. We are committed to fostering a culture of innovation, collaborating with stakeholders across sectors, and making a meaningful impact on society and the environment.
Company Background

Every company has a story — ours began with a simple frustration: starting a business felt way too complicated. Paperwork, licenses, legal forms, and strategies written in jargon no one really understood… it was enough to scare away even the most passionate entrepreneurs.

So in 2010, we decided to change that. What started as one person with a laptop, a lot of coffee, and a mission to make business easier has grown into a team of experienced consultants helping entrepreneurs across the world.

We believe business should be exciting, not overwhelming. Our goal has always been to take the scary parts — the paperwork, the financial planning, the strategy-building — and make them simple, clear, and even fun. Over the years, we’ve guided hundreds of entrepreneurs through the steps of turning their ideas into thriving companies.
Company Timeline
The beginning

Every great story starts with an idea. Ours was simple: help people start businesses without feeling lost in jargon and endless paperwork. Armed with one desk, one laptop, and a big pot of coffee, we began turning that idea into reality.
First wins

We landed our very first clients — brave entrepreneurs who trusted us when we were just starting out. We celebrated every launch like it was our own birthday party (cake included). Those early wins gave us the confidence to keep going.
Growing team, bigger dreams

What started as a one-person dream grew into a team of passionate problem-solvers. Each new teammate brought fresh energy, new skills, and their own ideas about how to make business support even better. Suddenly, brainstorming sessions felt like mini think-tanks.
Going global

Our calls and emails began coming from all over the world. Entrepreneurs from new markets wanted our help — and we couldn’t have been more excited. Supporting clients across different cultures gave us a bigger vision: to make starting a business easier everywhere.
Remote but unstoppable

When the world slowed down, we sped up. We adapted to remote work overnight, offering even more online support so no entrepreneur felt left behind. It was a tough time, but also the year we proved how resilient small businesses (and we) could be.
200+ businesses launched

From cozy cafés to global tech startups, we had officially helped more than 200 businesses launch. Every milestone wasn’t just a number — it was a story of someone’s dream coming alive. And yes, we might’ve shed a tear or two of pride.
Today
Still evolving

We’re not done yet. Business challenges keep changing, and so do we. From smarter digital tools to bigger support systems, we continue to make entrepreneurship simpler, friendlier, and way less overwhelming. Our mission stays the same: turning bold ideas into thriving businesses.

"When I started this company, I knew one thing for sure — business shouldn’t feel scary. Too many great ideas never get off the ground because the process feels overwhelming. My goal has always been to make things clear, simple, and even enjoyable for entrepreneurs. That’s what drives me every single day."
Aurelian Cross
Founder & CEO
KEY PERSONS
The Strategist

Aurelian started his journey with a Bachelor’s in Economics from the University of Edinburgh, followed by an MBA in Strategic Management from London Business School, where he graduated with distinction. His fascination with how businesses grow across borders led him to spend the first decade of his career working in Europe and Asia, helping companies expand into new markets.
MBA in Strategic Management, London Business School (with distinction)
Bachelor’s in Economics, University of Edinburgh
18+ years in business consultancy and strategic planning
Worked with Fortune 500 companies on international expansion strategies
Guided over 120 startups from concept to launch, securing multi-million-dollar investments
Business strategy and growth planning
International market entry and expansion

Head of Operations
The Builder

Dorian is the backbone of the company. He ensures everything runs smoothly — from our internal systems to the processes we design for clients. His impact has been felt in creating efficiency, building scalable operations, and keeping our clients stress-free. Without him, the big ideas wouldn’t get executed with such precision.
Master’s in Finance & Operations, University of Amsterdam
Bachelor’s in Accounting & Business Management, University of Warsaw
15+ years in financial and operational leadership roles
Former Operations Manager overseeing 50+ retail outlets across Europe
Designed scalable financial systems for SMEs that cut operational costs by up to 25%

Marketing Director
The Storyteller

Cassian is the creative voice of the company. He’s the one who turns complex services into stories people understand and remember. His impact can be seen in how our clients’ brands shine — gaining visibility, building trust, and reaching the right audiences. He’s proof that good storytelling is as powerful as good strategy.
Master’s in Marketing and Digital Communication, University of Melbourne
